name: All Gamers Dice Bag
description:
All Gamers Dice Bag is a simple 3D dice simulator that allows you to set up custom rolls for many different games that require dice.

Features include:
- Add up to 12 different dice to each custom roll.
- Select from Standard role playing game style dice 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 and 20 sided plus a classic 6 sided dice.
- 8 different colors to add to your custom rolls.
- Custom naming for each roll.
- Multiple camera angles.
- Realistic 3D looking rolls.
